scripts.doc: typedoc src/index.ts --excludeNotExported --out doc/ --module commonjs --target ES5 --name 'Most Subject' src/index.ts
scripts.postdoc: git add doc/ && git commit -m 'chore(docs): build doc/'
scripts.test: npm run lib && npm run lint && npm run unit-test
scripts.dist: rimraf dist/ && mkdirp dist && npm run lib && browserify lib/index.js -t babelify -t browserify-shim --standalone mostSubject --exclude most,@most/prelude --outfile dist/most-subject.js && uglifyjs dist/most-subject.js -o dist/most-subject.min.js
scripts.postdist: git add lib/ dist/ && git commit -m 'chore(dist): build dist/'
scripts.prerelease: npm run doc && npm run dist && npm run changelog
scripts.release-patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch -m "chore(release): release new version"
scripts.release-minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor -m "chore(release): release new version"
scripts.release-major: npm run prerelease && npm version major -m "chore(release): release new version"
